definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: If the fish sink to the bottom, add more salt to the water in the container.
sentences.chinese: 如果魚沉入水底，那麼在容器內的水中再加鹽。

sentences.english: Under water that was clear as glass the pool was carpeted with green sponge.
sentences.chinese: 在清明如鏡的水底鋪着一層碧綠的海綿。

sentences.english: The scuba diver submerged and swarm toward a coral reef.
sentences.chinese: 戴着呼吸器的潛水員潛入水底，朝珊瑚礁遊了過去。

sentences.english: He reached for it with both hands and stirred up the milky mud at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 他用雙手去捉，把水底的乳白色泥漿全攪渾了。

sentences.english: Maybe it's fate is never under water.
sentences.chinese: 也許它的歸宿是永沉水底。

sentences.english: Bottom of the water setting shelter.
Gravity meters and their operators were lowered to the water bottom in diving bells.
sentences.chinese: 重力儀及操作員們都在鐘形潛水器內沉到水底。

sentences.english: When Rodger finally felt his feet touch bottom, he was gasping.
sentences.chinese: 當羅傑的腳終於觸碰到水底時，他已氣喘噓噓了。

sentences.english: There were once two boys who dived in a river where they found at its bottom a bundle of feathers.
sentences.chinese: 譬如昔日，有二小兒，入河遨戲，於此水底得一把毛。

sentences.english: 4: An underwater volcano is called a seamount.
sentences.chinese: 水底下的火山叫海底錐形山。

sentences.english: He dropped the stone into the river and it sank to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 他扔到河水中的那塊石頭沉到了水底。

sentences.english: I heard, as if from underwater, the final growl of the hunter.
sentences.chinese: 彷彿置身在水底，我聽到了獵食者的最後一聲咆哮。

sentences.english: He dived into the water to look for the dead body.
Bait usually consisting of oily fish ground up and scattered on the water.
sentences.chinese: 魚餌，通常由沾油的魚類構成，在水底和散在水面上。

sentences.english: Pump impeller loose, grinding to pump out the bottom end caps.
sentences.chinese: 水泵葉輪鬆動，磨到水泵出水底端蓋。

sentences.english: Once they are underwater, they close and fold the winglike fins so that they can swim.
sentences.chinese: 在水底時，他們就闔起翼狀的鰭開始游泳。

definition: Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
water plants/habitat with water source and grass
